name: Thai Red Curry
ingredientLines: 4 chicken thighs sliced into thin pieces
1-2 tbsp of red curry paste (just store bought, or you can make your own!)
2 fresh Kaffir lime leaves removed from the stem rolled and chopped (sub with 2 tsp of lime zest and the juice of a whole lime if you can't find the leaves)
½-1 medium sized red chilli, seeds removed and finely sliced (use according to taste preferences)
1 x 400g can of cocunut cream (or sub coconut milk but will be runnier)
2 tsp of cocunut sugar (or sub palm sugar or cane sugar)
1 handfull of sweet Thai basil ( or use regular basil if you cant get Thai basil)
